item.title: Aging music lovers what happens when we are 80?
item.description: In a few years time, many of us will want to retire - what’s going to happen to us and our communities we live in if suddenly todays 20 and 30 somethings are 80?

item.title: Apple to standardise iTunes prices in Europe
item.description: comment: The reason that Apple charges different retail prices in each market is due to the differences in wholesale prices charged in each market by the major labels.

item.title: UK Digital sales grow by 50% in 2007
item.description: The British Phonographic Industry, which represents the British recorded-music business, said total music download sales for the year topped 77 million, a 50 percent increase over 2006.
